text: is a Japanese footballer. He played professionally for JPV Marikina during the 2018 Philippines Football League season. Previously he played as a striker for Edgeworth FC in the National Premier Leagues Northern NSW. ==Personal life== Moriyasu's father, Hajime Moriyasu, is a former international football player and football manager. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Edgeworth |2016 |rowspan="2"|Northern NSW Football |21||17||0||0||0||0||21||17 |- |2017 |24||10||4Appearances in the FFA Cup||3||0||0||28||13 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !45!!27!!4!!3!!0!!0!!49!!30 |- |JPV Marikina |2018 |Philippines Football League |6||2||1Appearances in the Copa Paulino Alcantara||1||0||0||7||3 |- |RW Koblenz |2018–19 |Oberliga Rheinland-Pfalz/Saar |12||2||0||0||0||0||12||2 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !63!!31!!5!!4!!0!!0!!68!!35 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:J3 League players Category:YSCC Yokohama players
